thread.title: Countryboy Redneck
thread.title_full: Rush Order Tees reviewed by Countryboy Redneck

author: Countryboy Redneck
title: Countryboy Redneck
text: So had about 10 shirts I was going to order and had a question about they're ribbed fitted tank top. I selected the live specialist in watched as I was transferred to 3 different people without any of them acknowledging me or answering my question. 10 minutes I waited it was utterly ridiculous...
